date_created.description: The date the booking was created.

date_created_utc.description: The date the booking was created, as UTC.

check_in_time.description: Check in time in H:i:s format.

check_out_time.description: Check out time in H:i:s format.

country.description: Country code in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format

adults.description: Quantity of adults. Used for services that are paid for for each person.

quantity.description: How many times the customer will be charged.

currency.description: Currency the booking was created with, in ISO format.

accommodation_type.description: Accommodation Type id. Enter 0 to select all.

date_created.description: The date the payment was created.

date_created_utc.description: The date the payment was created, as UTC.

date_modified.description: The date the payment was modified.

date_modified_utc.description: The date the payment was modified, as UTC.

date_expiration.description: Time to expiration pending of payment.

date_expiration_utc.description: Time to expiration pending of payment, as UTC.

country.description: Country code in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format

accommodation_type_id.description: Unique identifier for the accommodation type resource.

view.description: City view, seaside, swimming pool etc.

slug.description: An alphanumeric identifier for the resource unique to its type.

parent.description: The ID for the parent of the resource.

periodicity.description: How many times the customer will be charged.

date_created.description: The date the image was created, in the site's timezone.

date_modified.description: The date the image was last modified, in the site's timezone.

basic.description:
Fill in these fields:
* **Username** — `consumer_key`
* **Password** — `consumer_secret`

\* *Create access keys in the administration dashboard:*\
*Accommodation > Settings > Advanced*
